Steeeeve

If the answer is yes, you better have blonde hair, be between the ages of 14-24 , female, white, and have bad loud mouth parents. If you don't fall into this category I suggest you don't get yourself lost on some island or killed by a bikini top.
 
 I understand that ever murder to tragic but I have a hard time believing that the only tragic deaths are the ones covered by Fox News. Too bad that girl in Durham, NC wasn't a pretty blonde hair white girl or people might actually believe her! I'm not claiming "racisim" here or anything but it does seem a little odd when you see "Blonde hair white girl missing!" every night on Greta (Fox News) for OVER A YEAR.
 
 Perhaps we can expand...or rather be fair with....the reporting of missing or murdered persons. I'd hate to see a report on me going missing..."man missing...probably raped 10 people while running away from his drug habit". Thanks Fox! Way to get the true story emoticon_rolleyes

Then there must be another reason why administration's personal media outlet is concentrating on that demographic sector. It is a business driven solely by advertising revenue.

 
 Well put. ALL television relies on "viewership", which translates to ratings, which translates to value for advertisers, which translates to revenue and profit. Television networks aren't any different than any other business: they present the products that generate the most sales revenue. There's a perfectly designed defense mechanism built into the system for any offended viewer; it's the channel button on your remote control.
